extension.summary: This service notifies you of stinger scenes in the currently playing movie.
extension.description: This add-on notifies you of stinger scenes in the current movie, popping up a notification when the credits roll. It uses tags to identify movies that have a stinger scene, which can be automatically added by the Universal Movie Scraper from The Movie Database. It can also query the ChapterDb if the media file does not have chapters to better identify the end credits.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on requires the tags 'aftercreditsstinger' and/or 'duringcreditsstinger' on movies with a stinger scene.
